content:
Asset is untagged - Developer
Skip to content
Events when an asset is untagged
Â¶
When an
asset
is untagged in Atlan, the following event is emitted.
CLASSIFICATION_DELETE
Â¶
Atlan always emits a
CLASSIFICATION_DELETE
event when a tag is removed from an asset.
For both direct tags and propagations
Remember that these events will be emitted for both the asset from which the tag was directly removed as well as all assets to which the tag removal is propagated.
2022-11-07
2024-10-01
